Text: Live 1986, also known as "Eric Clapton & Friends Live 1986" or "The Eric Clapton concert" is a concert film released by the British rock musician Eric Clapton.

Text: Live 1986:  It was originally released on VHS in 1987 and later re-released on DVD in 2003.
